text: tatha (he nabee!) yaad karo, jab vah sabako ekatr karake (kahegaah) he jinnon ke giroh! tumane bahut-se manushyon ko kupath kar diya aur maanav mein se unake mitr kahenge ki he hamaare paalanahaar! ham ek-doosare se laabhaanvit hote rahe[1] aur vah samay aa pahuncha, jo toone hamaare lie nirdhaarit kiya tha. (allaah) kahegaah tum sabaka aavaas narak hai, jisamen sadaavaasee hoge. parantu, jise allaah (bachaana) chaahe. vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar gunee sarv gyaanee hai
